spells.name: Dimensional Lock
spells.description: Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

spells.name: Mind Blank
spells.description: Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

spells.name: Prismatic Wall
spells.description: Wall's colors have array of effects.

spells.name: Protection from Spells
spells.description: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

spells.name: Incendiary Cloud
spells.description: Cloud deals 6d6 fire damage/round.

spells.name: Maze
spells.description: Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

spells.name: Planar Binding, Greater
spells.description: As lesser planar binding, but up to 18 HD.

spells.name: Summon Monster VIII
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Trap the Soul
spells.description: Imprisons subject within gem.

spells.name: Discern Location
spells.description: Reveals exact location of creature or object.

spells.name: Moment of Prescience
spells.description: You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

spells.name: Prying Eyes, Greater
spells.description: As prying eyes, but eyes have true seeing.

spells.name: Antipathy
spells.description: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

spells.name: Binding
spells.description: Utilizes an array of techniques to imprison a creature.

spells.name: Charm Monster, Mass
spells.description: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

spells.name: Demand
spells.description: As sending, plus you can send suggestion.

spells.name: Irresistible Dance
spells.description: Forces subject to dance.

spells.name: Power Word Stun
spells.description: Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.

spells.name: Symbol of Insanity
spells.description: Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

spells.name: Sympathy
spells.description: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

spells.name: Clenched Fist
spells.description: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.

spells.name: Polar Ray
spells.description: Ranged touch attack deals 1d6/level cold damage and 1d4 points of Dexterity drain.

spells.name: Shout, Greater
spells.description: Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

spells.name: Sunburst
spells.description: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

spells.name: Telekinetic Sphere
spells.description: As resilient sphere, but you move the sphere telekinetically.

spells.name: Scintillating Pattern
spells.description: Twisting colors confuse, stun, or render unconscious.

spells.name: Screen
spells.description: Illusion hides area from vision and scrying.

spells.name: Shadow Evocation, Greater
spells.description: As shadow evocation, but up to 7th level and 60% real.

spells.name: Clone
spells.description: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

spells.name: Create Greater Undead
spells.description: Creates shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.

spells.name: Horrid Wilting
spells.description: Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

spells.name: Symbol of Death
spells.description: Triggered rune kills nearby creatures.

spells.name: Form of the Dragon III
spells.description: Turns you into a Huge dragon.

spells.name: Giant Form II
spells.description: Turns you into a Huge giant.

spells.name: Iron Body
spells.description: Your body becomes living iron.

spells.name: Polymorph Any Object
spells.description: Changes a subject into anything else.

spells.name: Temporal Stasis
spells.description: Puts subject into suspended animation.
